quests.name: The Antipodean Hammer
quests.description: Find Amber and Madness Ore for two rival Blacksmiths.

quests.name: Ghosts of Vitharn
quests.description: Set things right for the ghosts of a fallen castle.

quests.name: To Help A Hero
quests.description: Retrieve the stolen medallion of a Knight of the Thorn.

quests.name: Brithaur
quests.description: Stop him from making everyone go crazy! Oh wait...

quests.name: Final Resting
quests.description: Help Hirrus Clutumnus end his life.

quests.name: Taxonomy of Obsession
quests.description: Help a Dunmer finish her research.

quests.name: The Museum of Oddities
quests.description: Una Armina wants you to find "Oddities" for her museum.

quests.name: Everything In Its Place
quests.description: "Liberate" a farm's Khajiit workers from the "cruel mind control" of their overseer.

quests.name: Falling Awake
quests.description: Find a place to sleep for a scared Breton.

quests.name: Work is Never Done
quests.description: Help Tove the Unrestful build a sky boat from calipers and tongs.

quests.name: Ushnar's Terror
quests.description: Ushnar is terrified of cats, but unfortunately a Khajiit beggar has become his shadow.

quests.name: The Coming Storm
quests.description: Help Ahjazda prepare for the storm.

quests.name: The Fork of Horripilation
quests.description: Find the Fork of Horripilation for Big Head!
